document.heading: Conversion Therapy for Minors Prohibition Amendment Act of 2014

history.narrative: Law 20-218, the “Conversion Therapy for Minors Prohibition Amendment Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-501. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Nov. 18, 2014, and Dec. 2, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Dec. 22, 2014, it was assigned Act No. 20-530 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-218 became effective on Mar. 11, 2015.
